name: ♞Sp4Rt4♞
description: A Spartan warrior wore a bronze corselet or breastplate, a bronze helmet, a pair of greaves, a thrusting spear about eight feet long, and a short sword. Spartan soldiers were also known for their distinctive scarlet cloak, which helped to apparently helped the warrior disguise their blood if they were wounded. 8x8 in. Acrylic on Canvas. Purchase comes with only physical copy - DM for details
